requiredPDFs.title: Seller’s Permit
requiredPDFs.description: Permit required in order to sell or lease tangible personal property in the State of California.

requiredPDFs.title: Automotive Repair Dealer License
requiredPDFs.description: Licenses business that work on motor vehicles and ensures state regulations and and standards are enforced.

optionalPDFs.title: Seller’s Permit (optional)
optionalPDFs.description: Permit required in order to sell or lease tangible personal property in the State of California.

requiredPDFs.title: Vehicle Dealer License
requiredPDFs.description: This license is required for businesses that deal in automobiles and other vehicles, such as car dealerships.

requiredPDFs.title: Environmental Health Hazardous Materials Registration
requiredPDFs.description: Registration ensures that hazardous waste is stored safely, legally managed, and disposed of properly.

optionalPDFs.title: Seller’s Permit (optional)
optionalPDFs.description: Permit required in order to sell or lease tangible personal property in the State of California.

requiredPDFs.title: Medical Waste Generator Registration
requiredPDFs.description: Required for any person whose act or process produces, generates, or stores medical waste onsite.

requiredPDFs.title: Adult Day Care License
requiredPDFs.description: Allows businesses to provide certian levels of assistance care to to older persons and adults in need.

optionalPDFs.title: Seller’s Permit (optional)
optionalPDFs.description: Permit required in order to sell or lease tangible personal property in the State of California.

requiredPDFs.title: Residential Facility License
requiredPDFs.description: Allows an individual or corporation to run a senior residential facility, ensuring health and safety standards are met. These facilities require varying levels of personal care and protective supervision.

requiredPDFs.title: Medi-Cal/Medicaid Enrollment
requiredPDFs.description: Allows fee-for-service healthcare providers to enroll in the Medi-Cal program and bill that organization for services provided.

optionalPDFs.title: Seller’s Permit (optional)
optionalPDFs.description: Permit required in order to sell or lease tangible personal property in the State of California.
